      • getClasses

        List<Class> getClasses(String orderByInsertionDate,
                       Integer numberDaysToLookBack)
                throws AppException
        Parameters:
        orderByInsertionDate - - if set, it represents the order by criteria (ASC or DESC) for displaying classes
        numberDaysToLookBack - - if set, it represents number of days to look back for classes, null
        Returns:
        list with classes corresponding to search criteria
        Throws:
        AppException
